page.title: 06Killerby Hall Farm Crops
page.content:
Mr.Stobbs grows :_ 1 Winter Wheat 2 Winter Barley and Spring Barley 3 Oil Seed Rape
{Barley}is sown September to October.He is growing 144 acres this year, 80 acres for seed and the rest to be sold for cattle food. He is growing 40 acres of{Spring Barley}, sown in March for seed. { Oil Seed Rape}was sown on August 28,1984. Mr.Stobbs has sown 45 acres which will be harvested in August 1985.It flowers in May and June and Mr.Stobbs has bees to assist pollination.The oil seed is sent away for crushing to extract the oil from the seed to make margarine or cooking oil.
